item.title: About me
item.author: karl.hepworth@gmail.com (Karl Hepworth)
item.description: My name is Karl. I’m a self-taught open source developer with an interest in Drupal, Go, tooling and automation. I also love back-end development of almost any kind. I’m the luckiest father and husband in the world, for we have one daughter who my life would be incomplete without. We live in a rather under-rated city of Canberra, Australia. I say under-rated because only those that live here really “get” it.
